about_the_game:
The land of Novariel is a vast and peaceful one. But one day slimes in different colors and clothing appeared and made the once peaceful world a dangerous one.

Create your hero and fight against the slimes! Free the cities, help the lost citizens and explore a vast world ready for you.

This game is a singleplayer RPG. It features a basic character creation, round based combat and an endless world.

IMPORTANT: The following content gets updatet as soon as I add more stuff to the game

World generation

The world is procedurally generated and offers currently the following tile-types with the mentioned content:

  • City: Houses, Trees, Rocks, Ores and NPCs
  • Forest: Trees, Rocks, Ores, NPCs, Enemies
  • Plane: Trees, Rocks, Ores, NPCs, Enemies
  • Mountain: Trees, Rocks, Ores, NPCs, Enemies
  • River: Trees, Rocks, Ores, NPCs, Enemies, River
  • Lake: Trees, Rocks, Ores, NPCs, Enemies, Lake
More tiles are planned

Races

Choose between the following races:

  • Human: The basic race.
  • Dwarf: Small but strong, always ready to fight.
  • Elf: Fragile but agile. Never angry an elf with a bow.
  • Giant: The biggest race in Novariel. Stupid but dangerous.
  • Goblin: The rarest race. You want to challenge yourself? Play a Goblin.

Classes

Choose between the following classes:

  • Warrior: You want a sword? Take it.
  • Mage: -Weird magic noises-
  • Thief: Why are my pockets always filled with gold?
